item.title: 南非官员公布的新数据显示，2023 年南非全国共有 499 头犀牛被盗猎，比上一年增加了 51 头。
item.description:
The new data, released by South African officials, shows 2023 saw a total of 499 Rhinos poached across the Southern African nation, an increase of 51 from to the previous year. https://t.co/IbaxQUv1qw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 参议员迈克-罗兹（Mike Rounds）在 "本周 "节目中说，米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）作为共和党参议院领袖的继任者必须既能与包括唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在内的下一任总统合作，又能 "坚持自己的立场"。
item.description:
Mitch McConnell's successor as Republican leader of the Senate must be able to both work with the next president, including Donald Trump, and "stand his own ground," Sen. Mike Rounds said on "This Week." https://t.co/P6HLK9m9KC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 警方在亚特兰大郊区佐治亚六旗游乐园附近与多达 600 人的 "不守规矩人群 "交火，造成一人中弹，目前正在追捕多名嫌疑人。
item.description:

item.title: 一年一度的艾迪塔罗德（Iditarod）雪橇犬比赛是阿拉斯加州的官方体育项目，周六比赛正式开始，在共享的多用途雪道上进行训练时，雪橇犬与雪地摩托车相撞，造成五只雪橇犬死亡，八只雪橇犬受伤，比赛开始后，比赛开始注重安全问题。
item.description:
The Iditarod, the annual sled dog race celebrating Alaska's official state sport, got underway Saturday with a new focus on safety after five dogs died and eight were injured in collisions with snowmobiles while training on shared, multi-use trails. https://t.co/DQlsGJ2adH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 雷克斯-查普曼（Rex Chapman）在 NBA 打拼了十几年，但在此期间，他也在与毒瘾作斗争，这让他失去了人际关系、经济等等。
item.description:
Rex Chapman spent a dozen years with the NBA, but during that time he was also battling addictions that cost him relationships, finances and more.

In a new memoir, he explores his struggle and recovery. https://t.co/fukiyB9rg9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 一名妇女在被诊断出患有乳腺癌后冷冻了自己的卵子，她说自己现在正处于等待是否能将冷冻胚胎移植出阿拉巴马州的困境中，以实现成为母亲的目标。
item.description:
A woman who froze her eggs after being diagnosed with breast cancer said she is now stuck in limbo waiting to see if she can transfer her frozen embryos out of Alabama in order to fulfill her goal of becoming a mother. https://t.co/HOROL4sUMi

item.description:

item.title: 为什么香蕉似乎不受通货膨胀的影响？虽然通货膨胀推高了杂货店大多数货架的价格，但香蕉却令人印象深刻地抵御了农产品通胀，全国各地的消费者仍然可以买到香蕉：
item.description:
Why are bananas seemingly immune to inflation? While inflation has pushed prices up in most aisles of the grocery store, bananas have impressively defied produce inflation and remained accessible to consumers across the country.

Read more: https://t.co/oFyTqWWoDI pic.twitter.com/jTEgWDJK2S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 悼念：2018年的这一天，英国运动员罗杰-班尼斯特爵士（Sir Roger Bannister）在英国牛津去世，享年88岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: On this day in 2018, Sir Roger Bannister, the British athlete who, while a medical student, became the first person to run a mile in under four minutes, died in Oxford, England at the age of 88. https://t.co/bSFD2PjYlA (edited) pic.twitter.com/Oo33bGOnfK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家气象局（National Weather Service）称，加州内华达山脉（Sierra Nevada mountains）大部分地区暴雪预警生效，一场 "严重的冬季暴风雪 "可能会带来高达 12 英尺的积雪。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024
